TCPMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.messages
The TCPMessage class represents a message body used in TCP protocol.

TCPMessageController - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller
The TCPMessageController class handles TCP messages received from the server and interacts with the client controller.
TCPMessageController - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.servercontroller
The TCPMessageController class handles incoming TCP messages and, based on the message header, does corresponding actions.
